categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic ranks

nodes.text: Among the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War, specially trained evacuation officers served with Alliance Special Forces to oversee the safe evacuation of high-priority bases. One such evacuation officer was Captain Shawn Valdez, whose efficiency ensured the safe evacuation of more than 86 percent of Echo Base personnel during the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY.
